title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

of State at the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department agriculture food marine) order 2024

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. Declan O’Rourke, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Declan O’Rourke, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to Pippa Hackett, Minister of State at the Department of 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine, with effect from 9 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

25 June, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 28th June, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [330] 3

ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
